summary: TL--- THE CONTACT OWNS A 2001 R W TR TRAILER WITH COOPER COURSER RADIAL AWT LT235/ 85 R16 DOT NUMBER UP0R83D400. THE CONTACT STATED THE SIDEWALLS ON ALL FOUR TIRES ARE CRACKING. THE CONTACT STATED THE TIRES HAVE LESS THAN 10,000. THE CONTACT TRAVELS ABOUT 60 MILE EACH WAY WITH THE TRAILER, THREE TIMES A MONTH AND THE TRAILER IS KEPT IN A BARN AND COVERED WHEN NOT IN USE. THE CONTACT STATED THE SPARE THAT IS MOUNTED ON THE SIDE OF THE TRAILER IS CRACKING ALONG THE SIDEWALLS AS WELL. THE TIRES ARE ORIGINAL TIRES THAT CAME WITH THE TIRE.  RL UPDATED 07/20/11*LJ  UPDATED 08/05/11
